original_title: Si Baleleng at ang Gintong Sirena
overview: Baleleng, an orphan, wished upon a star to find her parents, Little did she know that this same star who lead her to meet Perlita, her guardian - a golden mermaid. With the star as her guide, Baleleng embarks on her quest to find her family.
tagline: Some girls have so many dreams... But this girl has one mermaid
title: Baleleng and the Golden Mermaid
